snippet.title: Alaska Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: Dinosaur fans and rock hounds alike will dig the interactive Alaska Museum of Natural History, home of Alaska's largest exhibits of rocks, minerals and rare fossils....

snippet.title: Carnegie Museum of Art and Carnegie Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: These two world-class museums share the same building, and one ticket provides entry to both. Kids are entranced by the Hall of Architecture in the Museum of Art, which is filled with towering reproductions of majestic ...

snippet.title: American Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: Children will literally be shaking with pre-dinosaur-sighting excitement as they walk up the broad stone staircase of this world-famous museum...

snippet.title: National Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: Your child may ask if he can see Big Bob at this museum. Say yes if you don't suffer from arachnophobia: Big Bob is a tarantula the size of a...

snippet.title: Cleveland Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: The life-size replicas of dinosaurs will enrapture kids for an hour or two, but the outdoor zoo and lower-level children's center in this kid-friendly museum offer enough options to keep them engaged all day....

snippet.title: Utah Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: Walk into a mine shaft, touch the minerals, and feel the wet drips that come with miner work; get hands-on dinosaur play (dig for fossils, lifesized magnetic wall puzzles, and more) in the Dino Discovery Room; and see a...

snippet.title: Fernbank Museum of Natural History
snippet.description: The first thing you see when you walk into the huge brick-and-glass atrium are skeletons of an enormous Argentinosaurus locked in mortal combat with a T. Rex-like...

snippet.title: Movie Review: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
snippet.description: Light on plot but heavy on cool stuff? Should hold kids' attention (and maybe make them long for a museum trip in real life.)

snippet.title: The Call of the Wild
snippet.description: Find the best kid-friendly natural history museums

snippet.title: Academy of Natural Sciences
snippet.description: Dinosaur fans will love Dinosaurs Galore, featuring a huge Tyrannosaurus Rex and dozens of skeletons and fossils, at this natural history museum. They'll want to get dirty in the Big...
